title: GDG DevFest Bayern 2017
description: The biggest Google tech conference in Bavaria carefully crafted for you by GDG communities! All about Android, Web and Cloud from the world experts
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev, munich, bavaria, ratisbona
motto: Come for the talks, stay for the beer!
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included.
socialMotto: Add to circles, like, follow or connect with us on
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: Burda Bootcamp is an event space in Parkstadt Schwabing, Munich.
aboutOrganizers: GDG Android Munich GDG GoLang Munich, GDG Cloud Munich, GDG Munich, GDG Regensburg, GDG Erlangen-Nürnberg and GDG Passau are proud organizer of DevFest Bavaria
aboutGdg: Google Developers Group (GDG) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

Google Developers Groups (GDGs) - are open and volunteer geek communities who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.
